user_query: Can you fetch the list of players currently online on the VRising server with IP address 185.225.233.110 and port number 30015? Additionally, provide me with the full description of the server. Also, fetch the most recent video games news. Finally, give me a summary of the games market data.

TaskList.description: Fetch the list of players currently online on the VRising server using the provided IP address and port number.
Provide the full description of the VRising server based on the given IP address.
Fetch the most recent video games news from reliable sources.
Summarize the recent games market data, including trends and statistics.
